categories: Category:World of Reading Star Wars Rebels: Level 2

nodes.text: Hera's Phantom Flight is a young-readers World of Reading book in the Star Wars Rebels series. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 31, 2015. Adapted by Elizabeth Schaefer, the book is based on the Star Wars Rebels episode "Out of Darkness," written by Kevin Hopps.

Rebel pilot Hera stars in another exciting Star Wars adventure! Featuring exciting full-color art from the show, this World of Reading early reader is perfect for fans who are ready to read on their own.
